dct_title_s: Map shewing portion of the west coast of Vancouver Island compiled and drawn by direction of The Honerable G. B. Martin Chief Commissioner of Lands and Works.
dct_description_sm: MiU copies annotated to show land ownership. 1 map: col., mounted on cloth; 61 x 86 cm
dct_creator_sm: British Columbia. Department of Lands and Works
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
